description: InhibitRule defines an inhibition rule that allows to mute alerts when other alerts are already firing. Note, it doesn't support deprecated alertmanager config options. See https://prometheus.io/docs/alerting/latest/configuration/#inhibit_rule

equal.description: Labels that must have an equal value in the source and target alert for the inhibition to take effect.

source_matchers.description: SourceMatchers defines a list of matchers for which one or more alerts have to exist for the inhibition to take effect.

target_matchers.description: TargetMatchers defines a list of matchers that have to be fulfilled by the target alerts to be muted.
